moves.1. e4: So the first move for the Ruy Lopez is e4 by white.
moves.2. Nf3: Then the knight moves to f3.
moves.2... Nc6: And the black knight protects its pawn by moving to c6.
moves.3. Bb5: Then the bishop moves to b5 creating the Ruy Lopez! This is one of my favourite openings and I have also participated in a Ruy Lopez mini tournament.
